name: Solis Luna
description:
Created for the Kindred Community Game Jam #7 using the theme "Sun and Moon."

All art/music/code was created during the jam period, aside from 4 of the sound effects used. 

Control the orbit of the moon, using it as a weapon to destroy incoming enemies. Survive 10 waves of enemy attacks, and protect the sun at all costs... or else darkness awaits. 

Controls:

W - Increase orbit size

S - Decrease orbit size

D- Increase orbit speed

A - Decrease orbit speed

ESC - Pause game

Credits:

Created by: David Rosler
